item.title: Samsung Chromebook Plus XE513C24 K01
item.description: The Samsung Chromebook Plus XE513C24 K01 has an 12.3 inch screen with a max resolution of 2400x1600 pixels and is powered by a 2 GHz hexa-core processor.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 2 XE500C12 K02
item.description: The Samsung Chromebook 2 XE500C12 K02 sports a 11.6-inch display, is equipped with a 2.16 GHz dual-core Intel Celeron N2840 processor, 4 GB RAM and 16 GB eMMC storage.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 3 XE500C13 K02
item.description: The Samsung Chromebook 3 XE500C13 K02 sports a 11.6-inch display, is equipped with a 1.6 GHz dual-core Intel Celeron N3050 processor, 4 GB RAM and 16 GB eMMC storage.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 3 XE500C13 K01
item.description: The Samsung Chromebook 3 XE500C13 K01 sports a 11.6-inch display, is equipped with a 1.6 GHz dual-core Intel Celeron N3050 processor, 2 GB RAM and 16 GB eMMC storage.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 2 500C12 K01
item.description: The Samsung Chromebook 2 500C12 K01 has an 11.6 inch screen with a max resolution of 1366x768 pixels and is powered by a 2.16 GHz Intel Celeron dual-core processor.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 2 503C32 K01
item.description: The 13.3-inch model of the Samsung Chromebook 2 features a 2.0 GHz Samsung Exynos 5 Octa 5800 octo-core processor, 4 GB RAM, 16 GB SSD, 8.5 hours of battery life, and an elegant leather-like stitched design.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 2 503C12 K01
item.description: The 11.6-inch model of the Samsung Chromebook 2 features a 1.9 GHz Samsung Exynos 5 Octa 5420 octo-core processor, 4 GB RAM, 16 GB SSD, 8 hours of battery life, and an elegant leather-like stitched design.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 2 503C12 K02
item.description: The 11.6-inch model of the Samsung Chromebook 2 features a 1.9 GHz Samsung Exynos 5 Octa 5420 octo-core processor, 4 GB RAM, 16 GB SSD, 8 hours of battery life, and an elegant leather-like stitched design.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 303C12 H01
item.description: The Samsung Chromebook has a 11.6-inch display with 1080p support and is powered by a 1.7 GHz dual-core Samsung Exynos 5250 processor.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook 303C12 A01
item.description: The Samsung Chromebook has a 11.6-inch display with 1080p support and is powered by a 1.7 GHz dual-core Samsung Exynos 5250 processor.
